name: Virus in Space
description:
Move through an infected area with rescued engineers and scientists. Escort engineers to terminals to open doors and take them all to safety! What a hero!

Score by getting at least one survivor into the evacuation zone.  Score is based on time taken and number of survivors admitted before the door closes!

Beware anyone can be infected and add to the group only directed by their hunger for flesh!

  • Tango - Your team size is 2.
